column4: Hi all: What to do when I can't empty the trash bin, some files are still there and there's this message that says "permission denied"
try this is in the terminal : locate Trash

in previous versions of ubuntu, the Trash folder was also found at ~/.Trash... also if you were to unmount a usb drive without emptying th trash...those drives would have their own trash folder for files deleted on those drives...i think they were something ".Trash-username"
